scenario_text.value:
Get out of the way, Garurumon!
Miyuki’s up ahead, right?!

How foolish you are. Are you still obsessed
with that human child?
As if a thing like you could understand!

Right, I don’t understand...
how you could want to trust a human.

You know how I was betrayed, and yet you
still put your blind faith in one?

Miyuki has nothing to do with the cold-
hearted human who betrayed you!

Of course you were betrayed.
What did you think was going to happen?!
You’ve got some nerve.

Well then, what has your favorite human
ever done for you?

She has returned none of your kindness. You
have earned nothing but pain and suffering!

There’s nothing to gain from getting beaten
to a pulp just to protect a mere human!
What’s your point? That I should help you?

You should reconsider your own allegiances!
Is the Master worthy of your trust?

Can you really save the world with
a sacrifice?

Does the Master have such power? Is the
Master really a god?!
I know you have doubts, Garurumon!

Shut up! Shut! Up!
My only goal is my own revenge!

The world, the Master—none of that stuff
motivates me in the least!
If that’s true, then—
You guys!
